datastorage

Class DatabaseConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • datastorage.DatabaseConnection

  • public class DatabaseConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to open and close a connection with a database. And has to handle: SELECT-, INSERT-, UPDATE- and DELETE-statements from the DAO-classes.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Wesley Heesters, Renée Vroedsteijn, Thomas Roovers
    See Also:
    EmployeeDAO, IngredientDAO, OrderDAO, ProductDAO, OrderRowDAO, ProductIngredientsDAO
